AI Description: OpenMPI is an open-source Message Passing Interface (MPI) library that allows for parallel computing on a distributed memory system. CUDA (Compute Unified Device Architecture) is a parallel computing platform and programming model developed by NVIDIA for their GPUs. When used together, OpenMPI and CUDA enable high-performance parallel computing on GPU-accelerated clusters.
Core Features: Message Passing Interface (Mpi) For Distributed Memory Systems, Parallel Computing On Gpu-Accelerated Clusters, Integration Of Cuda For Gpu Programming, Support For High-Performance & Scalable Computing
General Tags: Parallel Computing, Distributed Computing, Gpu Acceleration, High-Performance Computing
